properties.name: A place to lay my hat
properties.description: Posted by Comidademama   Savigliano via macraThat\'s my home when I\'m back in my hometown. This big house was built in the XIX Century as a clay factory. Long time ago, while we were gardening, my father and I found here several old stone wheels for crushing clay. Around the firts quarter of last Century it became a regular apartment building and now is completely restored. I love to have an apartment here with the view of an old and high walnut tree and the sound of the tennis balls bumping not so far away, in the pubblic park. Savigliano is a quiet city with an amazing historical centrum and beautiful parks. Whit its remarkable Alps Mountains, amazing architectural monuments from ancient time until yesterday, welcoming people and terrific food and wine, Piemonte is a NorthernWest region in Italy worth to be discovered.
